Legislative History of Law 6-168
level.text: Law 6-168, the "Inheritance and Estate Tax Revision Act of 1986," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-372, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 23, 1986 and October 7, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 27, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-217 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
